item.title: Getting Started
item.description: [TOC] Syllabus img src="/uploads/Doc-Brown-Martin-Casanova.jpg" align="left" _Where we're going, we don't need roads_. (Brown, 1985) Objectives: I've been doing digital archaeology and digital history for over ten years. I still don't know the answer to a few questions, and our objectives for the course are to move us...

item.title: Open Access
item.description: [TOC] Open Access Research As historians, we aren't all that accustomed to sharing our research notes. We go to the archives, we take our photographs, we spend *hours* pouring over documents, photographs, diaries, newspapers... why should someone else benefit from *our* work? There are a number of reasons why...
